search.query: web_server=$web_server$ tag=web tag=activity | eval 2xx=if(status >= 200 AND status < 300, status, null()), 3xx=if(status >= 300 AND status < 400, status, null()), 4xx=if(status >= 400 AND status < 500, status, null()), 5xx=if(status >= 500 AND status < 600, status, null()) | stats count(2xx) as 2xx, count(3xx) as 3xx, count(4xx) as 4xx, count(5xx) as 5xx by http_user_agent | sort -5xx,-4xx
